title: February 2019 Q&A
description:
Every month I do a live Q&A with patrons.  Once in a while I make it public.  

Related links:

Most of the Time, the Earth is Flat
https://www.orthodoxartsjournal.org/most-of-the-time-the-earth-is-flat/

A Full Frontal Attack on The Copernican Revolution
https://youtu.be/v92aB64jio4

Heaven is Round, Earth is Square
https://www.orthodoxartsjournal.org/heaven-round-earth-square/

Carving workshops: www.hexaemeron.org

My links:
Support this channel: https://thesymbolicworld.com/support/

patreon: http://www.patreon.com/pageauvideos
subscribestar: http://www.subscribestar.com/jonathanpageau
paypal: http://www.paypal.me/JonathanPageau

website: http://www.thesymbolicworld.com
facebook: http://www.facebook.com/TheSymbolicWorld.com
twitter: http://www.twitter.com/pageaujonathan

My website designers,  Anomalist Design: https://www.anomalistdesign.com/

The music at the opening is Russian Eastern Overture, by Rimsky Korsakov.
